title: Research
textUnderTitle:
At the Faculty of Science, we are committed to pushing the boundaries of knowledge across various domains, from mathematics to geography. Our researchers are driven by curiosity, and their multidisciplinary approach leads to groundbreaking discoveries.

### Our Research Focus

Our internationally recognized research revolves around two core areas:

#### Advancing Scientific Frontiers
From unraveling the mysteries of the universe to understanding the intricacies of microorganisms, our work spans a broad spectrum. We believe in fostering collaboration between different fields to drive innovation.

#### Solving Real-World Challenges
We take pride in addressing pressing global challenges. Our researchers work on projects that aim to find sustainable solutions for environmental issues, healthcare, and technology.

## Join us on this journey of exploration and knowledge creation!
coloredBgCardText: Get to know our research by exploring interesting articles and stories. We cover a wide range of topics, from the latest discoveries to the people behind them.
